label: 記室
本: The Adoption of the Ritsuryo Codes and Their Civilizing Influence. ACTA ASIATICA, 99 . The Tōhō Gakkai . 2010-08
説明文: A term of respect added beside the addressee's name. They have adopted formats found in Chinese manuals of epistolary etiquette and take the form of well-balanced letters. Shitsuji 執事, kika 几下, jisha 侍者 and sayu 左右 were the same.
